Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION -  Delivered by The Rev. Michael Livingston, spiritual leader at the Riverside Church, located at 490 Riverside Drive, New York, NY 10027.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Abreu.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by the Rev. Michael Livingston, Interim Senior Minister spirtual leader at the Riverside Church, located at 490 Riverside Drive, New York, N.Y. 10027.

Council Member Abreu moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: ADOPTION OF MINUTES - Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meetings of December 9, 2021 and December 15, 2021 be adopted as printed by Council Member Marte.
Items.MinutesNote: Council Member Marte moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meetings of December 9, 2021 and December 15, 2021 be adopted as printed.

Items.Title: Petitions and Communications
Land Use Call-Ups

By Council Member Sanchez:
Pursuant to Sections 11.20b and 11.20c of the Council Rules and Section 197-d(b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application C 220082 PCX (NYPD Bronx Special Victims Services) shall be subject to Council review.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, NYPD Bronx Special Victims Services, Bronx (C 220082 PCX)
